name: Zombie Hunter (SaiBalaji22)
description:
A third person horror shooter game for Windows PC.  You play as a swat team member who is given a mission to infiltrate a street occupied my hordes of zombies due to bio hazard outbreak. You need to search and retrieve a MedKit which is hidden in the one of the houses present in the street at the same time decent the zombie attacks by using a rifle, ammo ,explosive barrels and a flash light.

Minumum requirements 

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD Ryzen 3 2.6ghz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 530 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11

Recommend 

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD Ryzen 3 2.6ghz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Mx150 2GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
